Context: Name of the action to insert a Highlight into the workspace
The main storage object for 2D GuiObjects displayed on the user's screen.
A container object used to layout other GUI objects, and allows for scrolling. A special Frame that handles all scrolling for you, with a range of different ways to customize how the scrolling works.
Name of the action to display the Storybook plugin
Name of the action to display the Inspector plugin
Defines flex behavior for its parent GuiObject under the control of a UIListLayout.
A TextLabel renders a rectangle, like a Frame, with styled text.
A TextButton behaves similarly to TextLabel in regards to rendering with the additional behaviors of a GuiButton.
Allows the player to provide text input. It behaves similarly to a TextButton, except that a single TextBox can be put in focus by clicking, tapping or gamepad selection.
An ImageButton behaves similarly to an ImageLabel in regards to rendering with the additional behaviors of a GuiButton.
An ImageLabel renders a rectangle, like a Frame does, with an image.
Exit the client in a multi-client testing session
